prompts: Create a Psychic-type Pokemon that has a plush, round body and a playful demeanor.
Show me a whimsical creature with a lavender belly and gray fur, perfect for a forest setting.
Imagine a medium-sized Pokemon that dances joyfully, with pink accents and big ears.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon that loves to use psychic powers to entertain people.
Make a unique Pokemon design featuring a mix of gray and purple, known for its joyful personality.
Give me a playful, round-bodied Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and urban areas.
Design a charming Pokemon that captivates with its gentle movements and vibrant colors.
